title: Mean-reflected $G$-BSDEs with multi-variate constraints
authors: Yiqing Lin, Falei Wang, Hui Zhao
abstract:
In this paper, we study the multi-dimensional reflected backward stochastic
differential equation driven by $G$-Brownian motion ($G$-BSDE) with a
multi-variate constraint on the $G$-expectation of its solution. The generators
are diagonally dependent on $Z$ and on all $Y$-components. We obtain the
existence and uniqueness result via a fixed-point argumentation.
